mapper.sql: t.dzid dzid, t.sjdzid sjdzid, t.dzlx dzlx, t.dzbm dzbm, t.dzmc dzmc, t.dzjc dzjc, t.dzdz dzdz, t.xzqh xzqh, t.lxr lxr, t.lxdh lxdh, t.sxdsl sxdsl, t.xygbsl xygbsl, t.wzgysl wzgysl, t.zqrs zqrs, t.zdymc zdymc, t.zdydh zdydh, t.dzcm dzcm, t.dzdh dzdh, t.zqcl zqcl, t.mhjl mhjl, t.sysl sysl, t.zddwsl zddwsl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,sxdsl,xygbsl,wzgysl,zqrs,zdymc,zdydh,dzcm,dzdh,zqcl,mhjl,sysl,zddwsl,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sxdsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xygbsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{wzgysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zqrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zdymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzcm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqcl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{mhjl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zddwsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.DZID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,sxdsl,xygbsl,wzgysl,zqrs,zdymc,zdydh,dzcm,dzdh,zqcl,mhjl,sysl,zddwsl,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzid,#{item.sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sjdzid,#{item.dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzlx,#{item.dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzbm,#{item.dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzmc,#{item.dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzjc,#{item.dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzdz,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxr,#{item.lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxdh,#{item.sxdsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sxdsl,#{item.xygbsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xygbsl,#{item.wzgysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} wzgysl,#{item.zqrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zqrs,#{item.zdymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdymc,#{item.zdydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdydh,#{item.dzcm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzcm,#{item.dzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzdh,#{item.zqcl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zqcl,#{item.mhjl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} mhjl,#{item.sysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sysl,#{item.zddwsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zddwsl,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dzid = VALUES(dzid), sjdzid = VALUES(sjdzid), dzlx = VALUES(dzlx), dzbm = VALUES(dzbm), dzmc = VALUES(dzmc), dzjc = VALUES(dzjc), dzdz = VALUES(dzdz), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), lxr = VALUES(lxr), lxdh = VALUES(lxdh), sxdsl = VALUES(sxdsl), xygbsl = VALUES(xygbsl), wzgysl = VALUES(wzgysl), zqrs = VALUES(zqrs), zdymc = VALUES(zdymc), zdydh = VALUES(zdydh), dzcm = VALUES(dzcm), dzdh = VALUES(dzdh), zqcl = VALUES(zqcl), mhjl = VALUES(mhjl), sysl = VALUES(sysl), zddwsl = VALUES(zddwsl), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
SELECT DZBM codeValue,DZJC codeName,DZID dzid FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND SUBSTR(DZBM,3,6) = '000000' AND DZBM != '01000000' ORDER BY DZBM
SELECT DZBM codeValue,DZJC codeName,DZID dzid FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.SJDZID = #{value} ORDER BY DZBM
